abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises 104.83 points, or 0.89 percent, to 11,913.62; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index gains 1.29 percent to 1,254.19; Nasdaq composite index advances 2.35 percent to 2,699.44.
snippet: Several companies announced acquisitions that lifted shares along with a hint of more Fed stimulus and hope for a solution to Europe’s debt crisis.
lead_paragraph: Several companies announced acquisitions that lifted shares along with a hint of more Fed stimulus and hope for a solution to Europe’s debt crisis.

headline.seo: Stocks Rise on Mergers and Solid Corporate Earnings
